statements.select: SELECT AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName , AA.GroupID , AA.MenuID , AA.UseYn FROM dbo.TGroupMenu AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#

SELECT AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName , AA.GroupID , AA.MenuID , AA.UseYn FROM dbo.TGroupMenu AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.GroupID = #GroupID# AND AA.MenuID = #MenuID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.TGroupMenu ( CreatedOn, CreatedBy, CreatedByName, GroupID, MenuID, UseYn ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreatedBy#, #CreatedByName#, #GroupID#, #MenuID#, #UseYn# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.TGroupMenu SET UpdatedOn = GetDate() , UpdatedBy = #UpdatedBy# , UpdatedByName= #UpdatedByName#
, GroupID = #GroupID# , MenuID = #MenuID# , UseYn = #UseYn# WHERE ID = #ID#
